name: Slimber (concept build)
description:
Slimber

Play as Slimber, a cute little slime creature that needs to climb to get about in this very little concept build!

I'm planning on sticking with this and turning into a more fully featured thing. I'm thinking about going back to Unity to remake it and comparing to see which of the two would better suit me for development but I'm liking the character, the look of things and ideas I have for it!

This is probably the first proper thing I've finished in years, I'm loving games dev again and this has been a fun project while trying out an engine I've not used before. It still needs audio which I will get to, more levels and whatever else I can come up with. 

This is just a fairly standard platformer at the moment that's lacking some polish but the beginnings of what I want are in there!
